project.title: Charterag
project.description: Sailing experience frontend page created using Next.js.

project.title: Rental Car
project.description: Web application for car rental services. Applying the knowledge of good design principles acquired in the Human-Computer Interaction course.

project.title: Animal Shelter
project.description: A 5-page frontend website for animal shelter using React. Enhanced by integrating a backend built with Node.js and Express.js, enabling features such as animal record management, user roles, and form submissions.
